keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmapALL


map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map r reload

map <a-h> scrollLeft
map <a-l> scrollRight
map v enterVisualMode
map i focusInput
map <c-o> visitPreviousTab

map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

map H goBack
map L goForward
map h previousTab
map l nextTab

map x removeTab
map X restoreTab

map p duplicateTab
map y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

map : Vomnibar.activate

map t createTab
map ? showHelp 
map m toggleMuteTab

map M moveTabToNewWindow
map <a-x> closeOtherTabs

map gf nextFrame
searchEngines:
# g : https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google

# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
